summary: Request for an official Temporal integration with the OpenAI Agents SDK for JavaScript/TypeScript, similar to the existing Python SDK integration. This would enable durable state persistence, fault recovery, observability, and scalable agent execution within Temporal workflows.
userImpact: TypeScript/JavaScript developers cannot leverage Temporal's durability and fault recovery capabilities with the OpenAI Agents SDK, limiting enterprise-grade agent deployments.
proposedFix: Develop and release an official OpenAIAgentsPlugin for the TypeScript SDK with equivalent functionality to the Python integration.
keyQuote: The first AI agents library we're integrating with in TS is ai. The PR is in review, so it should hopefully land soon.
